snippet: It remained unclear what had led friends who met at a high school in London, Ontario, to their deaths at a gas plant that was seized in January.
abstract: Canadians Xristos Katsiroubas and Ali Medlej, both men in their 20s, are identified as being among militants killed in attack on Algerian gas plant in January; path that led two from London, Ontario, to their deaths in attack remains unclear but adds credibility to warnings from Canadian officials about radicalization of country's young people.

byline.contributor: Mark Mazzetti contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: It remained unclear what had led friends who met at a high school in London, Ontario, to their deaths at a gas plant that was seized in January.

headline.seo: 2 Canadians Who Joined Algeria Attack Are Identified
headline.main: 2 Canadians Who Joined Algeria Attack Are Identified
headline.print_headline: 2 Canadians Who Joined Algeria Attack Are Identified
